long_description: Expand your travel options with the Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Daypack Waistpack. It almost quadruples in size from a waistpack to roomy daypack for explorations farther afield. This innovative, ultralight bag is made from highly durable and water-resistant silnylon (nylon impregnated with silicone). Converts from a waistpack with a capacity of 7 liters to a 26-liter daypack, so it can hold lunch, gear and a light sweater. Top perimeter of waistpack unzips and daypack pulls out. Color-coded webbing loops and clips show you where to connect the pack straps. Main compartment has finger-friendly zipper pulls that can take a lock (sold separately). Zip-away internal divider helps you organize contents; 2 side compression straps manage the load. Adjustable mesh backpack straps wick moisture for comfortable carrying; wings on the adjustable waist belt add stability. Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Daypack Waistpack has reflective accents for low-light visibility. Included carry/storage pouch can double as an internal security pocket. Washable.
short_description: Expand your travel options with the Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Daypack Waistpack. It almost quadruples in size from a waistpack to roomy daypack for explorations farther afield.
